overview.en: Social Activity Token (SAT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Social Activity Token has a current supply of 470,763,467.17520905 with 126,967,463.17520893 in circulation. The last known price of Social Activity Token is 0.00051959 USD and is up 1.44 over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://sphere.social.
